attributes.action: To ban Ambulance chasing accident adverts
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to stop ambulace chasing adverts. There are just so many, on TV especially.
These people charge exorbitant amounts of money, so that whatever amount the claimant may get the  solicitors/lawyers etc. milk the defendants of any such actions. They are going to destroy,(for example), the NHS, then where?who will they move on to?
Failing this not allowing adverts on tv until after a certain time,say 22.00.
